Actions.Name: Create new lead
Actions.Description: Creates a new lead for your Intercom account.

Actions.Name: Create or update user
Actions.Description: Creates a new user for your Intercom account. Users found via email will be updated.

Actions.Name: Get lead
Actions.Description: Given the id for an existing lead, this operation returns all information about the  lead.

Actions.Name: Get user
Actions.Description: Given the id for an existing user, this operation returns all information about the user.

Actions.Name: List all leads
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all leads within your Intercom account.

Actions.Name: When a new conversation starts
Actions.Description: Triggers when a user starts a new conversation.

Actions.Name: When a lead is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new lead is created.

Actions.Name: When a user is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new user is created.

Actions.Name: When a user is updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing user's information is updated.
